amendment.description: An amendment numbered 108 printed in House Report 117-75 to allow states flexibility to return funds for HOV facility after 10 years of operation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows states flexibility to return funds for HOV facility after 10 years of operation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Duyne amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 178 (Roll no. 204).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
